# General info and notes before starting 
* There are 14 water bath tubes set up to examine 14 strains of drosophila:
![wb](https://github.com/HannahHChu/Notebooks/blob/master/Images/IMG_8035.JPG)

# Reagents 
* N/A

# Machines, Apparatus, & Instruments
Water Bath: LAUDA ECO Silver Immersion thermostat, Model ECO RE 1050 S   

* Catalog No. LCK 4918
* [Website](http://www.capitolscientific.com/LAUDA-LCK-4918-Model-ECO-RE-1050-S-Stainless-Steel-Refrigerated-Circulator-Bath-with-ECO-Silver-Th)
* [Manual](http://www.lauda-brinkmann.com/downloads/manuals/Eco%20Silver.pdf)

Thermocoupler: Omega HH506RA Multilogger Thermometer    
![pic](https://github.com/HannahHChu/Notebooks/blob/master/Images/thermocooler3.JPG)

* Model No. HH506RA  
* [Website](https://www.omega.com/pptst/HH506A_HH506RA.html)
* [Specs](https://www.omega.com/temperature/pdf/HH506A_HH506RA.pdf)
* [Manual](https://www.omega.com/manuals/manualpdf/M4079.pdf)

Glass Test tubes: Pyrex No. 9826
* Manufacturing No.: Corning, 9826-16, O.D. × L 16 mm × 100 mm
* [Website](https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/catalog/product/aldrich/cls982616?lang=en&region=US)
Test tube rack: Full-View Test Tube Rack, 13-16mm tubes, 50 Place
* Manufactoring No. H18911-0000
* [Website](https://www.supplymylab.com/Supplies/Racks/_/PIN-STYLE-TEST-TUBE-RACKS?=&gclid=CjwKCAjwsJ3ZBRBJEiwAtuvtlFGpJXjTFulK0gRzhGnNBXTrayx-hRXRtmuEZQ2NUpUmFCEtH8zjHRoCAGsQAvD_BwE)

Tube Set Up: Cut half of a styrofoam falcon tube rack and hot clue to plastic test tube rack

Aspirator Set up
* ![pic](https://github.com/HannahHChu/Notebooks/blob/master/Images/IMG_8079.JPG)
* Vinyl Tubing: Watts Clear Vinyl Tubing 8mm OD x 5mm ID
  * [Buy](https://www.amazon.com/Clear-Vinyl-Tubing-ID-250/dp/B000H5WQXC)
  * Ref. No.: 443063/LSVEB20
* Pipette tip for mouthpiece: 20uL

* Note: Place [mesh](https://www.amazon.com/Mosquito-Barrier-Hunting-Netting-Protect/dp/B015ADBL4U/ref=sr_1_10?ie=UTF8&qid=1529090596&sr=8-10&keywords=mosquito+netting+fabric) in 1000uL pipette tip to prevent inhaling fly.

3. Check the flies once an hour for 2 hours. Once the temperature reaches 38.5ºC, observe fly knockdown.

## 3. Static
1. Using the WinTherm-Thermal Analytics Software, imput desired temperature into "set temp" box and press enter.
2. Submerge apparatus into water bath for 200 minutes. 

## 4. Hardening
1. Using the WinTherm-Thermal Analytics Software, input first desired temperature into "set temp" box and press enter. 
2. Submerge apparatus into water bath for 60 minutes. 
3. Remove the apparatus for 5 minutes
4. Input second desired temperature into "set temp" box and press enter. 
5. Re-insert the apparatus into the water bath for 200min.
